markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Razor Claws](/Feats.aspx?ID=1053) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Lizardfolk" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=226" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Character Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=12) pg. 58 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

Your have honed your claws to be deadly. Your claw attack deals 1d6 slashing damage instead of 1d4 and gains the [versatile](/Traits.aspx?ID=200) (piercing) trait.
name: Razor Claws
